      jQuery(function(){
        var SelfLocation = window.location.href.split('?');
        switch (SelfLocation[1]) {
          case "justify_right":
            jQuery(".menu_left").megamenu();
            break;
          case "justify_left":
          default:
            jQuery(".menu_left").megamenu({ 'justify':'right' });
        }
      });
    </script>
<script type="text/javascript">
      jQuery(function(){
        var SelfLocation = window.location.href.split('?');
        switch (SelfLocation[1]) {
          case "justify_right":
            jQuery(".menu_right").megamenu({ 'justify':'left' });
            break;
          case "justify_left":
          default:
            jQuery(".menu_right").megamenu();
        }
      });
    </script>

}
